LLToast.message: This profile requires the BotBase Lisbeth to run.
Please make sure Lisbeth is installed correctly before proceeding.

If.Condition: not HasAtLeast(7915,&Shark_Tuna;) and IsTimeBetween(18,21) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
not HasAtLeast(7924,&Bombardfish;) and IsTimeBetween(8,15) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies')
